title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Workshop on Creating Science Education Content Using Digital Media

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Combine and produce three or more types of science education materials in accordance with open licenses and fair use principles

Learners plan and produce one 3-minute microlearning video using digital media tools (e.g., Canva, CapCut) on smartphones (including tablets) and submit deliverables meeting at least four of five instructor-provided checklist criteria (content structure, visual effects, learning objective clarity, etc.)
Explain citation and sharing strategies compliant with copyright guidelines

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
